DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Trial ALIMTA ( Pemetrexed ) Locally Advanced Metastatic Recurrent Transitional Cell Carcinoma Urothelium
DOC.criteria: You must diagnose bladder cancer recur move new part body . You must least one tumor physically measure scanned xray . You may previous chemotherapy ( drug ) treatment OR surgery follow one chemotherapy treatment least 4 month ago . You may use experimental medicine device within past month . Cancer spread brain . If unwilling unable take folic acid vitamin B12 supplement .
